bug.description: Alexander Seliverstov, [04.03.18 15:20] /start jhfirufoiug_bot, [04.03.18 15:20] Welcome to DeepPavlov inference bot! How may I help you?', 'Hello, welcome to the Cambridge restaurant system. You can ask for restaurants by area, price range or food type. How may I help you?'] Alexander Seliverstov, [04.03.18 15:20] I want cheap russian food jhfirufoiug_bot, [04.03.18 15:20] ['Hello, welcome to the Cambridge restaurant system.
